| History                 = '''Stark Solutions''' was a company founded by businessman [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] when [[Stark Enterprises (Earth-616)|Stark Enterprises]] had been taken over by [[Fujikawa Industries (Earth-616)|Fujikawa Industries]]. Stark Solutions had its headquarters at [[Flatiron District]]'s [[Stark Tower (Flatiron District)|Stark Tower]] in [[Manhattan]], [[New York City]].{{r|Iron Man Vol 3 1}}

[[Stephanie de la Spiroza (Earth-616)|Countess Stephanie de la Spiroza]] contacted Stark Solutions as a cover to have Iron Man, believed to be Stark's bodyguard, protecting her from [[Andreas Kapelos (Earth-616)|Andreas Kapelos]], who wanted to take over [[Dufours Precision Manufacturing Corporation|her company]].{{r|Iron Man Vol 3 2|3}}

Later Stark Solutions developed jointly with Stark-Fujikawa a new internet researching system, known as Starkware. Tony was invited by Fujikawa's President [[Kenjiro Fujikawa (Earth-616)|Kenjiro Fujikawa]] to a meeting at [[Isla Suerte]] to present the new line.{{r|Iron Man Vol 3 4|5}}

Several years later, '''Stark Solutions''' was relanuched by Tony Stark as a subsidiary of his newest company, [[Stark Unlimited (Earth-616)|Stark Unlimited]].{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man #1}}
